summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6094 for the improvement of 43rd Avenue South from Genesee Street to Bradford Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84093, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
